disgusting human beings, which was the furthest
thing from the truth. These kids had all gone to college, had college degrees, most of them, 'cause they wrestled in college. And we started to meet some, we loved the different stories. You had Chuck Liddell who had this Mohawk, looks like an ax murderer, but graduated from Cal Poly

like there's something here. If this thing was done the
right way, this could be big. And what was crazy was I was
in a contract negotiation with Bob Meyrowitz the
old owner of the UFC, over Tito's contract and Chuck Liddell. They didn't even want
